Text:
Thank you for posting wholesome material for me to show my young children. 
I've been unemployed for over 3 years now and I really can't afford to go out and rent these movies/shows, much less buy them. I pray every day that God will make His plan for me known and provide a way.

Now, do you have any way of getting subtitles/srt files for these shows? I like to keep the subtitles on the screen so the kids might "soak up" the reading. English mainly, however, other languages are good to.
